recipe.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipe.ingredients: 250 g Butter 1/2 C Sugar 1/2 Tin Condensed milk 3 C Flour 2 tsp Baking Powder 1/2 C Chocolate Chips
recipe.steps: Cream Butter, sugar and condensed milk. Add Flour, Baking Powder and Chocolate. Combine Well. Put on tray in small balls. Flatten with a fork. Cook at 180C for 15 minutes.
